title: [1.7.10][内含英文][内含音乐][亚图姆]“悠闲”化世界你值得拥有——“养生悠闲”
author: Koroding1
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Koroding1 于 2018-11-24 19:08 编辑 
整合包悠闲至上介绍Introduction of integration package


首先恭喜一下IG，LPL牛*，IG牛*，我们是冠军！——2018.11.4First of all, congratulations on IG, LPL Fierce, IG Fierce! We are the champions!-- 2018.11.4


背景音乐Background musichttp://music.163.com/style/swf/widget.swf?sid=1317860638&type=2&auto=1&width=320&height=66剧情 Plot你是一名小孩子，因爱看古代剧就一直想着穿越什么的，一直在搞些乱七八糟的，有的没的后来就这样，一不小心的穿越到了10世纪的世界You are a child, watching ancient drama because of love.I've been thinking about crossing everything. I've been making some mess.Later, it accidentally crossed the world in tenth Century.模组 Mod
辅助类装饰型“悠闲”生产业等价交换木匠的方块暮色森林枫树工艺矿工天堂竹传送书植物魔法拆解台展示架龙骑士更多使用设备把未来带到现实更多门任意门生长工艺动态光源大门四次元口袋潘马斯农业工艺NEI3D放置更多背包潘马斯工艺附属R键整理光影（可选）更多武器魔力读取器植物矿石方块酱虚无背包更多食物G键合成表豆腐工艺糖果世界JAFFA腐肉烧皮革以太2超级工具滑稽烹饪书壁纸 简单的飞行魔法作物基础苹果核日历阿普洛斯的翅膀魔法作物装备生活调味料
 玻璃碎片一键挖矿无限熔浆
 背包宠物矿工指南针战利品袋
元素物质精灵球幸运方块
 Pun
魔法四叶草
中世纪村庄
超级附魔
亚图姆提示：↓ 注：未知是否有Bug
连睡觉都别有一番风格


 Auxiliary class Decorative type "Leisurely" Production industry Equivalent exchange The carpenter's Cube Duskwood Maple tree technology Miner's paradise bamboo Transmission book Plant magic Disassembly table Display frame Eragon More equipment Bring the future to reality More doors Arbitrary gate Growth process Dynamic light source gate Four dimension pocket PAMP agriculture technology NEI 3D placement More knapsack Pancas crafts subsidiary Inventory Tweaks Light and shadow (optional) More weapons Magic reader Plant ore Ketchup Nihilistic knapsack More food G key synthesis table Tofu Technology The confectionery world JAFFA Rotten meat and leather Ether 2 Supertool funny Cookery book wallpaper Simple flight Magic crop Foundation Apple kernel calendar Apu Los's wings Magic crop equipment Life seasoning  Glass fragments One key mining Infinite melt  Backpack pet Miners compass Spoon bag  Elemental substance Fairy Ball Lucky block  Pun  Magic clover  Medieval villages  Super enchantment  Atum Hint:↓ Note: Is there Bug unknown?  Don't even have a way to sleep.
Bug Bug1.亚图姆的鱼钩（带诱惑属性）使用后会导致崩溃，但不会毁档2.发现Bug请留言3.皮肤模组USkin无法使用，未知精灵皮肤模组是否能使用，下个版本见证1. the use of the hook (tempting property) of the instrument will cause a crash, but not destroy it.2. find Bug please leave message.3. skin module USkin can not be used, unknown Elven skin module can be used, witness the next version.直播及实况 Live broadcast and live暂无若需要使用本整合包直播或实况请留言No timeIf you need to use this integrated package live or live, please leave a message.食用方法 Usage method1.内存使用2G2.光影请使用4G-8G3.请使用JAVA8X644.电脑配置：随意5.登录方式请使用：HMCL-3.1.83或者PCL.EXE6.选择离线或正版登录，Then，开始游戏1. memory usage 2G2. light and shadow please use 4G-8G3. please use JAVA8X64.4. computer configuration: optional5. login mode: please use HMCL-3.1.83 or PCL.EXE.6. choose offline or genuine login, Then, start the game.图片 Picture

SEV.2下载地址SEV.2 Download address

建议 Proposal1.配置高的可以使用光影，配置低的请勿硬撑2.配置好的可以选择添加此Mod[1.7.10]真实地形生成3.此为原贴的视频，可做参考http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTM5MzM3NjA3Ng==.html4.配置好的也可以选择添加此Mod[1.7.10]超多生物群系贴内含视频教程，由于懒惰，我就不发了5.经测试，上述Mod都完美地兼容了中世纪村庄Mod，可放心游玩1. high light and low profile.2. configure the option to add this Mod.[1.7.10] real terrain generation3. this is the original video, which can be used for reference.http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTM5MzM3NjA3Ng==.html4. configured, you can also choose to add this Mod.[1.7.10] super multiple biomesPosted with video tutorials, because lazy, I will not be issued.5. through tests, the above Mod are perfectly compatible with the medieval village Mod.坚决扫黑除恶，严厉抵制伸手党，不可错杀一千，也不可放过一人！We must resolutely fight against evil and fight against the party. We must not kill one thousand by mistake.
